name: Cube Dodge 1.0
description:
Move the Left & Right Arrow Keys to control the red cube. Avoid obstacles and collect the rotating green cubes for a higher score. Press ESC to pause the game and return to the menu or quit the game. HAVE FUN! 

-Download Link for Windows: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ugvmR0FvGOEdjmhCVxWwlxCcApZHXAeZ/view?usp=shari... Make sure to click More Info>Run Anyway when Windows Security comes up.

-Download Link for Mac: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1vjFnfo2nemMock_9UGgZy_IU_5qa2K0n/view?usp=shari...
